page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE
page.content: There are four people in my family,my father my mother my brother and myself. My dad has his own business,he runs a furniture factory.My mother works in the Civic Centre,my brother goes to Marsh Green primary school and I go to Dagenham Priory school. We live on Oval road South.We usually go around to my Grand-fathers every month or so.On Saturdays I usually go with my dad to his factory which is in Dagenham. Our house is a semi-detached house,it has double glazing.My uncle lives next door to us so we have joined the two gardens into one large garden. I like living in Dagenham and I would'nt like to move.
